Name: juandesant
AboutMe: After getting my Master Degree in Electronics Engineering (mention in Digital Signal Processing), I have worked in commercial software projects since 2000, and in software for astronomy (specially for automated data archival and retrieval) since 2005, for organisations such as IAA-CSIC (Spain) and the European Southern Observatory (ESO, Germany). I later moved to managing technology projects in astronomy in 2011 (back in IAA-CSIC), with emphasis on the Spanish participation in the Square Kilometre Array (SKA) project, and since 2014 I am the Systems Engineer at the SKA Organisation in charge of overseeing the development of the computing elements for the SKA, namely the Science Data Processor (SDP) and the Telescope Manager (TM).
